response.overview: Walt Disney's timeless masterpiece is an extravaganza of sight and sound! See the music come to life, hear the pictures burst into song and experience the excitement that is Fantasia over and over again.
response.tagline: The most sensational sound you'll ever see!
response.title: Fantasia

cast.name: Leopold Stokowski
cast.character: Self - Conductor of The Philadelphia Orchestra

release_dates.note: New York City, New York (roadshow version)
